1.content:
Ok here's some quick rules, I'm going to put it in the first chapter so I know you read it.

You either completely win and lose no men or you completely lose and everyone on your side dies.
Please do not make it an easy war, you win some and you lose some right?
Keep track of your numbers or the war will turn easily.
You can send out recruiters but be aware you could be leaving yourself at risk.
You can only use your catapults if you are being attacked you cannot use them if your attacking.

Ok now pick your country.

Britain

Overwhelming numbers of light infantry, only a small amount of cavalary and weak bowmen

250,000 Light Infantry 70,000 Heavy Infantry 1,500 Light Cavalary 2,250 Heavy Cavalary 25,000 Bowmen 65 Catapults

France

Runs you down with high amounts of bowmen followed by Cavalary then the Infantry

125,000 Light Infantry 95,000 Heavy Infantry 5,000 Light Cavalary 3,000 Heavy Cavalary 40,000 Bowmen 25 Catapults

Italy

Legendary heavy infantry but mediocre in other groups

60,000 Light Infantry 140,000 Heavy Infantry 800 Light Cavalary 650 Heavy Cavalary 10,000 Bowmen 15 Catapults

China

Small but well trained and great fighters, never back down attitude

75,000 Light Infantry 60,000 Heavy Infantry 1,000 Light Cavalary 800 Heavy Cavalary 15,000 Bowmen 20 Catapults

Russia

Huge army but poorly trained scares you with it's numbers

200,000 Light Infantry 80,000 Heavy Infantry 6,000 Light Cavalary 1000 Heavy Cavalary 20,000 Bowmen 100 Catapults

So... Who's side are you on?
